title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 505.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

This Part shall apply in all civil administrative
enforcement proceedings brought, pursuant to section
145
(3)
of the Transportation Law, by the

Department of Transportation against alleged violators of the Transportation

Law, the rules and/or regulations promulgated pursuant thereto, or any permits, certificates or orders issued pursuant thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
505.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
